page.title: 14Dalston Hall
page.content: On friday 20th June Craig Smith and Keith Dickinson took the opportunity of sleeping at Dalston Hall.This is what happened.When we went in Mr Bishop took us straight to the library.Our mums and dads took our things up to our room which was number 10.We had a chat and a drink of coke.Later that evening Mr Bishop took us into the restaurant to have chips,beans and sausages.After that we went up to our room.We watched TV until midnight when Mr Bishop came for us to go ghost hunting.There are two ghosts there.We had no luck.In the morning we did some work until 10:30am when we went home.Part of the ground is a camping park but it is owned by different people.The hall is now used as a commercial hotel.
